title: How to Find Gardening Tools Made in the USA (+ Great American Made Garden Tools!) - AllAmerican.org

tasks.task: Search for and identify American-made gardening tools.
subtasks: Learn about material sourcing for gardening tools (steel, rubber/plastic handles).
Check online for country of origin (call brand if needed; check in-store labels).
Recognize Rogue Hoe Tools (Prohoe Manufacturing, London, Kansas; over 60 tools, durable, eco-friendly).
Identify Bully Tools (Steubenville, Ohio; heavy-duty, 11-gauge steel, good value).
Note Wilcox All Pro Tools (stainless steel, 100% US materials, reliable diggers).
Discover Fisher Blacksmithing (Bozeman, Montana; handcrafted, traditional blacksmithing, American walnut handles).
Mention Cobra Head and Garden Works (popular weeder/cultivator and trowel options).
Check popular brands (Cobalt, DeWalt) for American manufacturing.
Access written research on allamerican.org for more tool brand information.

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Identify American-made gardening tools by checking materials, origin, and specific brands.
subtasks: Examine materials used in tools (e.g., tempered or stainless steel).
Verify the country of origin (contact brand or check labels).
Recognize brands like Rogue Hoe Tools, Bully Tools, Wilcox All Pro Tools, Fisher Blacksmithing, Cobra Head, and Garden Works.
